EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_CloudFoundrySummit_Boston_Q118.General CF Summit Boston - 3/13/18
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit and Save 20% Off Your Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/?utm_source=any&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> Cloud Foundry Summit North America is around the corner and we want you to be there!
As software transforms industries across the world, more companies are embracing software as core competency to differentiate themselves with customers and capture new opportunities. But how do you get there?
Share and learn alongside thousands of your peers at this yearâ€™s Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2018/?utm_source=any&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> in Boston - where the global community meets to deep dive on the open source cloud application platform. Check Out the Mainstage Keynotes & Program
Choose from 110+ technical sessions <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event_subpages/na2018-schedule/]]> and breakouts from eight topic-based tracks, including a Cloud Foundry in the Enterprise track featuring end user case studies and a full-day track on government use cases of Cloud Foundry. Keynotes include:
- Matt Curry, Director of Cloud Engineering, Allstate Insurance Co.
- Subbu Allamaraju, Vice President, Cloud, Expedia Inc.
- Kelsey Hightower, Staff Developer Advocate, Google
- Gabe Monroy, Lead Principal Program Manager, Containers, Microsoft
- Carolyn van Slyck, Senior Software Engineer, Microsoft
- Andy Rosequist, Director of IT Operations, ZipCar
Register today <[[https://www.regonline.com/registration/checkin.aspx?EventId=2090045&MethodId=0&EventSessionId=&startnewreg=1&utm_source=all&utm_campaign=na18&utm_content=piv]]> and use the Pivotal discount code CFNA18PIV20 to get 20% off your Cloud Foundry Summit North America pass. We hope to see you there!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
